posts.subject: Fascism and third positionism: what we are NOT
posts.body:
Fascism, National Socialism and Third Positionism is NOT a set of ideologies made to 
- enslave everyone by everyone
- Control everyone through fear. Instead we want everyone to contribute to society, isn't that good?
- Kill every race we don't like, just like in tron legacy where CLU 2 (pictured), "dictator" of the programs, plans to kill all humans. Instead, NS Germany planned to move Jews to several reservations
